alert.note: Alert for Santa Barbara County Southwestern Coast (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued August 04 at 1:20PM PDT until August 05 at 3:00AM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM PDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Areas of northwest to north winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts to 45 mph through mid morning, and again this afternoon through late tonight. Isolated gusts to 50 mph this evening. * WHERE...Santa Barbara County Southwestern Coast. * WHEN...Until 3 AM PDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for drivers of high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
